price: 13. Alle baana iska leh waxa ku xasilan habeenka iyo maalinta, waana wax kasta Maqlaha, wax kasta Ogsoonaha ah.
arabic: ۞ وَلَهُۥ مَا سَكَنَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā sakana fī al-layli wal-nahāri wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
